file_content.text: You have already chosen your specialization.
You're that freighter captain who stirred things up on Ord Mantell. I hear you've got Rogun the Butcher after you. My condolences.
If you want to stay alive and retire wealthy, you need special training. I'll give you that, for a price.
I can make you into a real Gunslinger. Why fire one gun when you could shoot two? Gunslingers find the best cover in a firefight and stay there, doing damage.
Of course, some people prefer to be a Scoundrel. Make a sneak attack with a scatter gun from up close and even learn a bit of medicine training.
Once you start the training, you'll need to stick with it, so pick your specialization carefully.
Gunslinger it is. You'll specialize in the old shoot em' up method. Good luck out there!
Scoundrel always worked for me. We'll get you a scatter gun, a stealth belt and a combat-grade medpac. Good luck out there!
I have no business with you.
